{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=AIR-CAP3702 |revision=E-A-K9 |asin=B00UMARM68,B00H7O918O |fcc_date=08/15/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=LDK102087 |ic_id=2461B-102087 |pcb_id=FOC181726V8 |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.35 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=P1020 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8864 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-TNC |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8764 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-TNC |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=enterprise class |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=64:12:25,F4:4E:05 |oui_eth=64:12:25,F4:4E:05 }} {{TagLine|Cisco Aironet 802.11ac Dual Band Access Point}} :[http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/wireless/aironet-3700-series/index.html Product page] (3700 Series) *AIR-CAP3702(E/I)-(D/N/Z)-K9, AIR-SAP3702(E/I)-(D/N/Z)-K9 :This FCC ID would appear to cover most of the 3702 APs. :This particular one is an external antenna model (3702'''E''' vs 3702'''I'''). :Stated covered models in the FCC test report are... Used OUIs may include 00:22:BD (on module MAC label) :and 44:D3:CA (on EUT back). 88W8764C ''may possibly'' be the P/N of the b/g/n radio. ===Serial=== ====Bootlog==== {{SCollapse|boot log • >> |
